title: SpotifySongRecommender
description: SpotifySongRecommender is a C++ project for analyzing and recommending songs. It includes features like recommending songs and artists based on musical genres, and generating popularity rankings by artist or genre.

title: Pathfinding-Algorithm-using-A-Star-in-a-2D-Matrix
description: This Python project implements the A* algorithm to find the optimal path in a randomly generated 2D matrix with obstacles. It allows users to choose between Manhattan and Euclidean distances for the pathfinding process. The matrix, along with the calculated path, is displayed on the console.
